legend: GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR PREPARATION OF BALANCE SHEET AND PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT
A Quick Checklist for Schedule III Compliance ( Non INDAS Companies )
Refer Guidance Note on Schedule III for additional requirements and specific Guidance

table_headers.title: Indicative Content as per Schedule III

data.Heading: General
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The disclosure requirements specified in this Schedule are in addition to and not in substitution of the disclosure requirements specified in the Accounting Standards prescribed under the Companies Act, 2013

data.Heading: General
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Additional disclosures specified in the Accounting Standards shall be made in the notes to accounts or by way of additional statement unless required to be disclosed on the face of the Financial Statements.

data.Heading: Rounding off
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Total Income < Rs 100 Crores-Round off to the nearest hundreds, thousands, lakhs or millions or decimal thereof

data.Heading: Rounding off
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Total Income > Rs 100 Crores-Round off to the nearest lakhs, millions or crores, or decimal thereof

data.Heading: Form of Balance Sheet
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Form of Balance Sheet to be exactly as per Schedule III including Rounding

data.Heading: Balance Sheet and PL
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Company Information and Basis Of Preparation And Significant Accounting Policies

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Each class of shares to be disclosed

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: the number of shares issued, subscribed and fully paid, and subscribed but not fully paid;

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: par value per share

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: reconciliation of the number of shares outstanding at the beginning and at the end of the reporting period

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: the rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to each class of shares

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: shares in respect of each class in the company held by its holding company or its ultimate holding company

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: shares in the company held by each shareholder holding more than 5 percent shares specifying the number of shares held

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: shares reserved for issue under options and contracts/commitments for the sale of shares/disinvestment, including the terms and amounts

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: For the period of five years immediately preceding the date as at which the Balance Sheet is prepared, certain information

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Terms of any securities convertible into equity/preference shares

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Calls unpaid

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Forfeited shares

data.Heading: Share Capital
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Shareholding of Promoters

data.Heading: Reserves and Surplus
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Reserves and Surplus shall be classified under heads provided

data.Heading: Reserves and Surplus
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: A reserve specifically represented by earmarked investments shall be termed as a ‘fund

data.Heading: Reserves and Surplus
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Debit balance of statement of profit and loss shall be shown as a negative figure under the head ‘Surplus’ etc.,

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Long-term borrowings shall be classified under relevant heads as provided

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Borrowings shall further be sub-classified as secured and unsecured

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Nature of security shall be specified separately in each case

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Disclosure where loans have been guaranteed by directors or others

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Disclosure relating to Bonds/debentures

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Particulars of any redeemed bonds/ debentures which the company has power to reissue

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Terms of repayment of term loans and other loans shall be stated.

data.Heading: Long-Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Period and amount of continuing default as on the Balance Sheet date in repayment of loans and interest,

data.Heading: Long Term Liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Other Long term Liabilities shall be classified as: Trade Payables and Others

data.Heading: Long Term Liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Aging of Trade payables and unpaid Dues

data.Heading: Long Term Liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: MSME Dues to be disclosed

data.Heading: Long-term provisions
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: LTP shall be disclosed as Provision for employee benefits and Others

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Short-term borrowings shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Borrowings shall further be sub-classified as secured and unsecured

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Nature of security shall be specified separately in each case

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: loans have been guaranteed by directors or others shall be disclosed

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Period and amount of default as on the Balance Sheet date in repayment of loans and interest to be disclosed

data.Heading: Short -Term Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Current maturities of Long term borrowings shall be disclosed separately

data.Heading: Trade Payables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Aging of Trade payables and unpaid Dues

data.Heading: Trade Payables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: MSME Dues to be disclosed

data.Heading: Other current liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Other current liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Application money received for allotment of securities shall be disclose as per the Schedule III as applicable

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Assets under lease shall be separately specified

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: reconciliation of the gross and net carrying amounts of each class of assets

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Sums have been written off on a reduction of capital or revaluation of assets

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: amount of change due to revaluation

data.Heading: Property, Plant and Equipment
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: other adjustments and the related depreciation and impairment losses/reversals shall be disclosed

data.Heading: Intangible assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Intangible assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: reconciliation of the gross and net carrying amounts of each class of assets

data.Heading: Intangible assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Sums have been written off on a reduction of capital or revaluation of assets

data.Heading: Non-current investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Non-current investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Under each classification, details shall be given of names of the bodies corporate indicating whether such bodies are (i) subsidiaries, (ii) associates, (iii) joint ventures, or (iv) controlled special purpose entities

data.Heading: Non-current investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Investments carried at other than at cost should be separately stated specifying the basis for valuation thereof.

data.Heading: Non-current investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Aggregate Amount, market value , dimunition in value shall be disclosed

data.Heading: Long-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Long-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Allowance for bad and doubtful loans and advances

data.Heading: Long-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Loans and advances due by directors or other officers of the company or any of them either severally or jointly with any other persons or amounts due by firms or private companies respectively in which any director is a partner or a director or a member should be separately stated.

data.Heading: Other non-current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Other non-current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Long term Trade Receivables, shall be sub-classified as Secured / Unsecured / Good / Doubtful etc

data.Heading: Other non-current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: For trade receivables outstanding, ageing schedule shall be given

data.Heading: Other non-current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Allowance for bad and doubtful debts shall be disclosed under the relevant heads separately.

data.Heading: Other non-current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Debts due by directors or other officers of the company or any of them either severally or jointly with any other person or debts due by firms or private companies respectively in which any director is a partner or a director or a member should be separately stated

data.Heading: Current Investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Current Investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Under each classification, details shall be given of names of the bodies corporate indicating whether such bodies are (i) subsidiaries, (ii) associates, (iii) joint ventures, or (iv) controlled special purpose entities

data.Heading: Current Investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Investments carried at other than at cost should be separately stated specifying the basis for valuation thereof.

data.Heading: Current Investments
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Aggregate Amount, market value , dimunition in value shall be disclosed

data.Heading: Inventories
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Inventories
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Goods-in-transit shall be disclosed under the relevant sub-head of inventories.

data.Heading: Inventories
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Mode of valuation shall be stated

data.Heading: Trade Receivables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Trade Receivables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Trade Receivables, shall be sub-classified as Secured / Unsecured / Good / Doubtful etc

data.Heading: Trade Receivables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: For trade receivables outstanding, ageing schedule shall be given

data.Heading: Trade Receivables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Allowance for bad and doubtful debts shall be disclosed under the relevant heads separately.

data.Heading: Trade Receivables
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Debts due by directors or other officers of the company or any of them either severally or jointly with any other person or debts due by firms or private companies respectively in which any director is a partner or a director or a member should be separately stated

data.Heading: Cash and cash equivalents
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Cash and cash equivalents
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Earmarked balances with banks

data.Heading: Cash and cash equivalents
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Balances with banks to the extent held as margin money or security against the borrowings etc

data.Heading: Cash and cash equivalents
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Repatriation restrictions, if any, in respect of cash and bank balances

data.Heading: Cash and cash equivalents
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Bank deposits with more than 12 months maturity shall be disclosed

data.Heading: Short-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Short-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Allowance for bad and doubtful loans and advances

data.Heading: Short-term loans and advances
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Loans and advances due by directors or other officers of the company or any of them either severally or jointly with any other persons or amounts due by firms or private companies respectively in which any director is a partner or a director or a member should be separately stated.

data.Heading: Other current assets
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: This is an all-inclusive heading, which incorporates current assets that do not fit into any other asset categories

data.Heading: Contingent liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Contingent liabilities and commitments (to the extent not provided for) to be included here

data.Heading: Contingent liabilities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amounts shall be classified as specified in Schedule III

data.Heading: Dividends
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: The amount of dividends proposed to be distributed to equity and preference shareholders for the period and relevant disclosures as per Schedule III

data.Heading: Issue of securities
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Issue of securities made for a specific purpose, the whole or part of the amount has not been used for the specific purpose a

data.Heading: Utilisation of Borrowings
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Where the company has not used the borrowings from banks and financial institutions for the specific purpose for which it was taken at the balance sheet date, the company shall disclose the details of where they have been used.

data.Heading: Realisable Value of PPE and Intangibles
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Any of the assets other than Property, Plant and Equipment, Intangible Assets and non-current investments do not have a value on realization in the ordinary course of business at least equal to the amount at which they are stated, disclosures as relevant

data.Heading: Omitted
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Omitted

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (i). Title deeds of Immovable Property not held in name of the Company

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (ii) . Where the Company has revalued its Property, Plant and Equipment, the company shall disclose as relevant

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (iii) Loans or Advances in the nature of loans are granted to promoters, Directors, KMPs and the related parties that are repayable on demand or without specifying the terms of repayment

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (iv) (a) . Aging of Capital Work In Progress

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (iv) (b) For capital-work-in progress, whose completion is overdue or has exceeded its cost compared to its original plan

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (v) (a) Intangible Assets under Development Aging Schedule

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (v) (b) For intangible assets under development, whose completion is overdue or has exceeded its cost compared to its original plan

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (vi) Details of Benami Property held

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (vii) Borrowings on Security of current assets

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (viii) Wilful Defaulter

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (ix) Relationship with Struck off Companies

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (x) Registration of charges or satisfaction with Registrar of Companies

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (xi) Compliance with number of layers of companies

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (xii) Ratios to be presented

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (xiii) Compliance with approved Scheme(s) of Arrangements

data.Heading: Additional Regulatory Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (xiv) Utilisation of Borrowed funds and share premium

data.Heading: Form of Profit and Loss Statement
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: As per format provided

data.Heading: Revenue
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Disclosure of heads of revenue of non finance companies

data.Heading: Revenue
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Disclosure of heads of revenue of finance companies

data.Heading: Finance Costs
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Amounts to be classified as per schedule III

data.Heading: Other Income
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Amounts to be classified as per schedule III

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (a) Employee Benefits Expense

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: (b) Depreciation and amortisation expense

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Any item of income or expenditure which exceeds one per cent. of the revenue from operations or Rs.1,00,000, whichever is higher

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Interest Income;

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Interest expense;

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Dividend income

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Net gain/loss on sale of investments

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Adjustments to the carrying amount of investments;

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Net gain or loss on foreign currency transaction and translation

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Payments to the auditor

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: expenditure incurred on corporate social responsibility activities

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Details of items of exceptional and extraordinary nature

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Prior period items;

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: a.Specific disclosures for manufacturing, trading, services, multiple type companies

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: b.In the case of all concerns having works in progress, works-in-progress under broad heads

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: c. and d. amounts set aside or proposed to be set aside, to reserve and withdrawals

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: a. and b. The aggregate, if material, of the amounts set aside to provisions made for meeting specific liabilities, contingencies or commitments and withdrawals

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Expenditure incurred on each of the following items, separately for each item as specified in the schedule - stores, power, rent, repairs, insurance, rates and taxes, misc exps etc

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Dividends from subsidiary companies and provisions for losses from subs

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: a.Value of imports calculated on C.I.F basis by the company

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: b.Expenditure in foreign currency during the financial year on account of royalty, know-how, etc

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: c. Consumption of imported inventories

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: d. amount remitted during the year in foreign currencies on account of dividends

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: e. Earnings in foreign exchange classified under the heads as specified

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Undisclosed income

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: CSR spends where applicable

data.Heading: Additional Information
data.Indicative_Content_as_per_Schedule_III: Details of Crypto Currency or Virtual Currency
